ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: Authors (GT & BLY) are grateful to the Departments of Chemistry and Life Science, Mewar University, Gangrar, Chittorgarh, Rajasthan, India for providing laboratory facilities. Sincere thanks to MNIT- Jaipur, Rajasthan, India for providing facilities for characterization of the nanoparticles. The authors are also grateful to the Heads of the Departments of Chemistry and Department of Zoology of M.L.S University for providing necessary facilities.
